name: reset-urge
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Selects another friendly Pokémon at random.  Removes all of that Pokémon's stat changes.

This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
short_effect: Resets a friendly Pokémon's stat changes.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
When used, it restores any stat
changes of an ally Pokémon.
